name: Buizel

evolution.description: Buizel can evolve into Floatzel at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 14 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Sea Weasel Pokémon. It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to burning.
